short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize comunication your browser makes and gives you possibility to find, mark and block trackers in it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension reveals advertising companies while they are tracking you on the web, but also visualize all the comunication that your browser makes and gives you possibility to find, mark and block trackers in it.
